title: Bug 114470[Smoke] Error message throws when using new Date('3/2/2005') as value in table filter.
OB: When using the value 'new Date('3/2/2005')' in a table filter, an error message is thrown.
EB: The filter should work without errors.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Save and preview the report.
2. Use the value 'new Date('3/2/2005')' in a table filter.
3. Observe the error message: There are error(s) in Table: table8.
   Error0: data.engine.DataConversionError (1 time(s))
   Detail: An error happened in data type conversion. Can not convert it to Date. Can not convert it to Date.
